name: Automobile Tycoon
description: Car manufacturing company simulator. Turn based, fast paced, covers 100 years of automotive history.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP or better Graphics: Screen resolution minimum 1024x768. Additional Notes: The game should run on almost any hardware, even outdated one. In case of problems run "safe" mode version.
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10, Win 7, Win XP Graphics: Any non integrated card should be perfect. Storage: 99 MB available space Additional Notes: In case of problems run "safe" mode version.
